name: comparator-factory-factory
description: Create comparison functions to be used for sorting arrays.

scripts.clean: rimraf index.js index.mjs index.d.ts index.iife.min.js coverage
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:iife && npm test
scripts.build:mjs: tsc -p . && node -e "require('fs').renameSync('index.js','index.mjs')" && uglifyjs -m toplevel=true -c join_vars=true -o index.min.mjs index.mjs
scripts.build:cjs: rollup -i index.mjs -f cjs -o index.js                                   && uglifyjs -m toplevel=true -c join_vars=true -o index.min.js  index.js
scripts.build:iife: rollup -i index.mjs -f iife -n comparatorFactoryFactory | uglifyjs -m -c join_vars=true -o index.iife.min.js
